channel.title: How do i replace a npc with another npc code
channel.description: I wanna place the black Warriors with Tyras Guards, but were do i find to change them?[br][size=1]Posted on: January 30, 2007, 06:37:26 PM[/size][hr]If you know how to add me on Msn, [email]HenzoDee.1@Hotmail.com[/email],I really need this to be done i may even reward you :o

item.title: How do i replace a npc with another npc code
item.dc:creator: @adamhelloman8 adamhelloman8
item.description:
@adamhelloman8 wrote:

do ::setnpc xxxx xxxx, x= numbers, first 4 are the original npcâ€™s id, and the last 4 are the id of the monster u want to turn it into

Read full topic
